thread.title: Sergio Aguero a wanted man as Inter Milan and Javier Zanetti enter the race for Manchester City striker
thread.title_full: Sergio Aguero a wanted man as Inter Milan and Javier Zanetti enter the race for Manchester City striker

author: tsheen
title: Sergio Aguero a wanted man as Inter Milan and Javier Zanetti enter the race for Manchester City striker
text:
EFL INTER AGUERO Sergio Aguero a wanted man as Inter Milan and Javier Zanetti enter the race for Manchester City striker 
Real Madrid and Barcelona both on red alert for Argentinian star By TOM SHEEN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments INTER MILAN will enter the race for Sergio Aguero if he is available in the summer, according to reports in Italy. 
Former international team-mate Javier Zanetti – now Inter vice-president – will be key in any potential move. Getty Images Inter Milan have entered the race for Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero Getty Images 5 Inter vice-president Javier Zanetti could be key in any move for Aguero 
The Argentinian, who has fallen out of favour with Pep Guardiola since Gabriel Jesus arrived, is considering his future at Manchester City . 
Speaking after the 2-1 win against Swansea at the weekend – where Jesus scored both goals – Aguero hinted that he could be prepared to leave the Etihad. Getty Images 5 Aguero and Zanetti played together for the Argentina national team 
He said: “I have to help the team as much as I can in these three months, afterwards we’ll see what the club wants to do with me. 
“In these last three months that are left I have to help the club and as I say the club will decide if I have a place here or not. 
“When you’re on the bench you have to wait for your opportunity. I have three months to do my best and help the team and we’ll see what happens.” Reuters Pep Guardiola has dropped Aguero several times this season RELATED STORIES Strike that Sergio Aguero and Diego Costa will NOT return to Atletico Madrid as president rules out moves for the strikers AGUERO RACE IS ON Real Madrid and Barcelona both watching Sergio Aguero's situation at City as summer move nears PSGEE WHIZZ Man City star Sergio Aguero and Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez are being targeted by mega-rich French giants PSG AUBA THE MOON Manchester City to go all-out for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang if Sergio Aguero leaves this summer SERGIO to where though? Aguero's time at Man City looks up as Gabriel Jesus moves in. But where will Argentine go next? Domino effect Arsenal could finally get their hands on £50m Karim Benzema - if Sergio Aguero moves to Real Madrid GOING NOWHERE Man City move quickly to deny Sergio Aguero exit talk after he hints he may be out of Etihad at end of season 'WE'LL SEE WHAT THE CLUB WANTS' Aguero sparks fears of summer exit if Pep Guardiola doesn't want star striker 
The club were quick to deny that Aguero, who has 154 goals for City, will be going anywhere – but he is now a prime target for clubs across Europe. 
According to Corriere Dello Sport , Inter are another side interested in his signature. 
Vice-president and Inter legend Javier Zanetti could be a key part of a potential deal. News Group Newspapers Ltd Aguero is also wanted by Real Madrid, Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain 
The pair have a good relationship, having played together for years in the Argentina national team. 
Inter’s new owners – Chinese company Suning – are also keen to splash the cash and get the club competing among the elite again. Old foes Pep Guardiola and Jose Mourinho spit bars in brilliant rap battle
